custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM ME_BAOCAODLI WHERE (ME_BAOCAODLI.MATINH = ?) AND (ME_BAOCAODLI.TRANGTHAI = ?) AND (ME_BAOCAODLI.NAM = ?)
SELECT * FROM ME_BAOCAODLI WHERE (ME_BAOCAODLI.MATINH = ?) AND (ME_BAOCAODLI.TRANGTHAI = ?) AND (ME_BAOCAODLI.NAM = ?) ORDER BY ME_BAOCAODLI.NAM DESC, ME_BAOCAODLI.MATINH ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM ME_BAOCAODLI WHERE (ME_BAOCAODLI.MATINH = ?) AND (ME_BAOCAODLI.LOAIBAOCAO = ?) AND (ME_BAOCAODLI.TRANGTHAI = ?) AND (ME_BAOCAODLI.NAM = ?)

SELECT * FROM ME_BAOCAODLI WHERE (ME_BAOCAODLI.MATINH = ?) AND (ME_BAOCAODLI.LOAIBAOCAO = ?) AND (ME_BAOCAODLI.TRANGTHAI = ?) AND (ME_BAOCAODLI.NAM = ?) ORDER BY ME_BAOCAODLI.NAM DESC, ME_BAOCAODLI.MATINH ASC
